name: Robntzedgame
description: "Aiming to achieve the goal of an arcade top down shooter game but capture the true essence of the zombie genre we combine Mechanics like- base building, perma-death, survival / story campaign, bandit and zed systems, weapon crafting, survival stats, and most importantly survivor management- work with as large a group you are able to collect and survive the harsh apocalypse."  I am planning to release many more updates over the course of these next four months- ALSO- "discovery" of what buttons to press after the home screen would be a perk, but theirs no tutorial so good luck, have fun figuring out how to drop an item. (sarcasm, promise tutorial soon) Play it with music, its mute except for a gun sound. Only come if your interested in seeing a project conclude with a gradual update every month or week depending on response.
